wikipedia_page.main: Sanchita Islam (Bengali: সঞ্চিতা ইসলাম; born 28 April 1973) is an English artist, painter, writer and filmmaker of Bangladeshi descent. In 1999, she founded Pigment Explosion, which has branched out into projects including film, painting, drawing, writing and photography.

response: Lawson eventually set about creating a narrative-less frame which he hoped would avoid closure.
